thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens lower as financial, tech stocks weigh

author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens lower as financial, tech stocks weigh
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Wall Street’s main indexes opened lower on Friday, led by losses in financial and technology stocks, but are on course to end with strong weekly gains as they rebound from last week’s sell-off.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 51.11 points, or 0.2 percent, to 25,149.26. The S&P 500 lost 6.09 points, or 0.22 percent, to 2,725.11. The Nasdaq Composite dropped 20.97 points, or 0.29 percent, to 7,235.47. (Reporting by Sruthi Shankar in Bengaluru; Editing by Savio D‘Souza)
